      • Create

        public static long Create(long netHandle,
                          int format,
                          int channel,
                          int range)
                   throws AiliaException
        Creates a classifier instance.
        Parameters:
        netHandle - A network instance handle
        format - The network image format (AiliaNetworkImageFormat)
        channel - The network image channel (AiliaNetworkImageChannel)
        range - The network image range (AiliaNetworkImageRange)
        Returns:
        A handle of classifier instance
        Throws:
        AiliaException - Exception

      • Destroy

        public static void Destroy(long handle)
        Destroys the classifier instance.
        Parameters:
        handle - A classifier instance handle

      • Compute

        public static void Compute(long handle,
                           byte[] src,
                           int srcStride,
                           int srcWidth,
                           int srcHeight,
                           int srcFormat,
                           int maxClassCount)
                    throws AiliaException
        Performs object classification.
        Parameters:
        handle - A classifier instance handle
        src - Image data (32 bpp)
        srcStride - The number of bytes in 1 line
        srcWidth - Image width
        srcHeight - Image height
        srcFormat - Image format (AiliaImageFormat)
        maxClassCount - The maximum number of classification results
        Throws:
        AiliaException - Exception

      • GetClassCount

        public static int GetClassCount(long handle)
                         throws AiliaException
        Gets the number of classification results.
        Parameters:
        handle - A classifier instance handle
        Returns:
        The number of classes
        Throws:
        AiliaException - Exception

      • GetClass

        public static AiliaClassifierClass GetClass(long handle,
                                            int clsIdx,
                                            int version)
                                     throws AiliaException
        Gets the classification results.

        If ailiaPredict is not run at all, the method throws AiliaException The classification results are sorted in the order of estimated probability.

        Parameters:
        handle - A classifier instance handle
        clsIdx - Index of class
        version - AiliaClassifierClass.version
        Returns:
        Class information
        Throws:
        AiliaException - Exception
